# Class Structure
The `{dbSpatial}` package contains convenience functions for working with diverse spatial file formats through the duckdb spatial extension, as well as functions for IO of spatial `{terra}` spatVector and spatRaster objects into a duckdb db.

For more information about duckdb spatial extension see [the duckdb spatial extension](https://duckdb.org/docs/extensions/spatial.html).

For more information about loading multiple geospatial files into duckdb, see the [duckdbfs package](https://github.com/cboettig/duckdbfs).
